description: This file contains utility functions and type definitions for handling JSON-RPC errors in a Rust project, specifically using the jsonrpsee crate. It defines error types, constructors for custom errors with codes, and some legacy error handling functions.

methods.name: rpc_err(msg: impl Into<String>) -> JsonRpcErrorType
methods.description: Creates a custom JSON-RPC error of type JsonRpcErrorType with a custom message.

methods.name: rpc_error_with_code<T>(msg: impl Into<String>, code: i32) -> JsonRpcErrorType
methods.description: Creates a JSON-RPC error with a specified message and error code, returning a Result with the error type.

methods.name: rpc_error_with_code_result<T>( msg: impl Into<String>, code: i32, ) -> Result<T, JsonRpcErrorType>
methods.description: Returns an Err with a JSON-RPC error constructed with a message and code, typed with a generic Result.

methods.name: rpc_custom_error_result<T>(msg: impl Into<String>) -> Result<T, JsonRpcErrorType>
methods.description: Legacy function that returns an Err with a custom JSON-RPC error message.

methods.name: rpc_custom_error<T>(msg: impl Into<String>) -> JsonRpcErrorType
methods.description: Creates a custom JSON-RPC error of type JsonRpcErrorType with a message.

ctags.name: rpc_custom_error_result
ctags.pattern: /^pub fn rpc_custom_error_result<T>(msg: impl Into<String>) -> Result<T, JsonRpcErrorType> {$/

ctags.name: rpc_error_with_code
ctags.pattern: /^pub fn rpc_error_with_code<T>(msg: impl Into<String>, code: i32) -> JsonRpcErrorType {$/

ctags.name: rpc_error_with_code_result
ctags.signature: <T>( msg: impl Into<String>, code: i32, ) -> Result<T, JsonRpcErrorType>
